**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 399 4.0 **Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283) **Range** touch or 30 feet (see text) **Target** 1 willing living animal creature --- You heal an animal's wounds, restoring 1d8 Hit Points to the target. The number of actions spent Casting this Spell determines its effect.
  • **somatic** The spell has a range of touch.
  • **somatic, verbal** The spell has a range of 30 feet and restores an additional 8 Hit Points to the target.
--- **Heightened (+1)** The amount of healing increases by 1d8, and the additional healing for the 2-action version increases by 8.
name: Heal Animal
